languages.text: {n}При ваших словах у людей вспыхивают от любопытства глаза. Они быстро обступают вас, готовясь услышать нечто необычное.{/n}
{n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При ваших словах у людей вспыхивают от любопытства глаза. Они быстро обступают вас, готовясь услышать нечто необычное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words make the people's eyes light up with curiosity. They surround you promptly, preparing to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
{n}Your words make the people's eyes light up with curiosity. They surround you promptly, preparing to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
{n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
{n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
{n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}
{n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，三个人眼睛都亮了起来，充满了好奇。他们急匆匆地聚在你身边，准备打探些不同寻常的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，三个人眼睛都亮了起来，充满了好奇。他们急匆匆地聚在你身边，准备打探些不同寻常的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de la gente se iluminan con curiosidad al oírte. Rápidamente se reúnen en torno a ti, dispuestos a escuchar algo extraordinario.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de la gente se iluminan con curiosidad al oírte. Rápidamente se reúnen en torno a ti, dispuestos a escuchar algo extraordinario.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin üzerine insanların gözleri merakla parlıyor. Olağanüstü bir şeyler duymaya hazır hâlde aceleyle etrafında toplanıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin üzerine insanların gözleri merakla parlıyor. Olağanüstü bir şeyler duymaya hazır hâlde aceleyle etrafında toplanıyorlar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人々があなたの言葉に好奇心で目を光らせる。慌ててあなたの周りに集まり、何か変わったことを聞こうとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人々があなたの言葉に好奇心で目を光らせる。慌ててあなたの周りに集まり、何か変わったことを聞こうとする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À vos paroles, les yeux de la foule s'illuminent de curiosité. Ils se pressent autour de vous, avides d'entendre ce que vous avez à dire, pour peu que ce soit extraordinaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À vos paroles, les yeux de la foule s'illuminent de curiosité. Ils se pressent autour de vous, avides d'entendre ce que vous avez à dire, pour peu que ce soit extraordinaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Leute merken bei deinen Worten neugierig auf. Sie versammeln sich eilig um dich herum, begierig darauf, etwas Außergewöhnliches zu hören.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's eyes light up with curiosity at your words. They hurriedly gather around you, ready to hear something extraordinary.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leute merken bei deinen Worten neugierig auf. Sie versammeln sich eilig um dich herum, begierig darauf, etwas Außergewöhnliches zu hören.{/n}
